comments.author: Michael Dürig
comments.body: /** * Test whether an {@link Authorizable} is a declared member of this group. * @param authorizable The Authorizable to test. * @return true if the Authorizable to test is a direct member * @throws RepositoryException If an error occurs. */ boolean isDeclaredMember(Authorizable authorizable) throws RepositoryException;

description: I suggest to add a method for checking whether an authorizable is a declared member of a group. Currently there is only a method for checking membership (which includes indirect memberships).
